products.title: Banbury Stone Grey Roman Blind
products.description: Effortlessly blending reliable, practical design and chic, contemporary style, the banbury stone grey roman blind is the perfect finishing touch for a range of rooms. This quality fabric blind provides a smart and effective window covering that is quick and easy to operate, whist the geometric pattern and cool grey colour palette is totally on-trend. Product id: db-rom1051 fabric colour: stone grey material: 78% polyester 14% cotton 8% linen lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets.

products.title: Banbury Canvas Roman Blind
products.description: With a chic and subtle style, the banbury canvas roman blind will suit a range of settings, whether classic or contemporary. This fabric blind has a sleek folding design that is compact and convenient at any window. The geometric pattern is highlighted in a soft cream tone and gives a touch of clean decoration in a versatile and neutral colour. Product id: db-rom1050 fabric colour: canvas material: 78% polyester 14% cotton 8% linen lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets.

products.title: Banbury Parchment Mink Roman Blind
products.description: Tie together a modern scheme with this smart window blind. The banbury parchment mink roman blind will provide practical shading at your windows and is sleek and easy to open and close using the sidewinder chain. This design features a striking geometric pattern in a warm grey colourway that will suit a range of neutral and contemporary interior schemes. Product id: db-rom1049 fabric colour: parchment mink material: 78% polyester 14% cotton 8% linen lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets.

products.title: Banbury Petal Pink Roman Blind
products.description: Cover your windows with a contemporary solution that is both practical and stylish, such as this banbury petal roman blind boasting a modern geometric pattern in a soft pink tone. This fabric blind will bring a delightful touch of gentle colour and pattern to your windows to complement your interior scheme whilst keeping your window space looking sleek and tidy. Product id: db-rom1048 fabric colour: petal pink material: 78% polyester 14% cotton 8% linen lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets.
